member.name: M:Avanteam.Extensions.EFCore.PropertyBuilderExtensions.HasUtcConversion(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder{System.Nullable{System.DateTime}})
member.summary: Adds a conversion that allows to defined the DateTimeKind to UTC when reading a DateTime? property from the store. Without that conversion, DateTime? properties are read with a value of Unspecified for their DateTimeKind.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Extensions.EFCore.PropertyBuilderExtensions.HasUtcConversion(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Adds a conversion that allows to defined the DateTimeKind to UTC when reading a DateTime property from the store. Without that conversion, DateTime properties are read with a value of Unspecified for their DateTimeKind.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Extensions.EFCore.PropertyBuilderExtensions.HasEnumToStringConversion``1(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.PropertyBuilder{``0})
member.summary: Adds a conversion method that allows to store an enum with its string representation. Without that conversion, its the numeric value which is used.
